healthcare-guide.title: 温哥华华人看病完全指南：从家庭医生到急诊，一篇文章搞懂BC医疗系统
healthcare-guide.titleEn: Complete Guide to Vancouver Chinese Healthcare
healthcare-guide.description: 刚来温哥华时，我遇到一对80多岁的华人老夫妇在沃尔玛。老奶奶背痛得厉害，但他们不知道该去哪里看病。这篇文章整理了BC省医疗系统的所有要点，帮助华人朋友们少走弯路。
healthcare-guide.descriptionEn: Complete guide to Vancouver Chinese healthcare: Understanding BC's healthcare system from family doctors to emergency rooms. Learn about MSP, walk-in clinics, urgent care, and how to navigate healthcare in Chinese.
healthcare-guide.author: 温哥华安心医疗

msp-insurance-guide.title: MSP医保详解：华人最关心的20个问题
msp-insurance-guide.titleEn: MSP Insurance Explained: 20 Questions Chinese Care About
msp-insurance-guide.description: 很多华人朋友对MSP医疗保险一知半解，不知道什么能报销、什么需要自费。这篇文章整理了华人社区最常问的20个MSP问题，一次性帮大家搞清楚。
msp-insurance-guide.descriptionEn: MSP Insurance Explained: 20 questions Chinese residents care about most, covering application process, coverage details, and what's included or excluded from BC's health insurance.
msp-insurance-guide.author: 温哥华安心医疗

siteInfo.siteDescription: 温哥华华人医疗互助社区，提供中文就医指南、MSP保险解读、找医生攻略。帮助华人朋友更好地使用BC省医疗系统。
siteInfo.siteDescriptionEn: Vancouver Chinese healthcare navigation and mutual aid community. Providing healthcare guides, MSP insurance explanations, and doctor-finding strategies in Chinese.
